title:
Why does the State not take proper care of the area between Leland and Wilmingon, especially the areas right around the Memorial Bridge? The trees are overgrown, guardrails & signs are covered in vines, signs are bent and crooked, lights are not working, grass is not mowed. It is deplorable looking.

What a way to showcase one of the main entrances to our city!
text:
This is an ongoing issue and has been addressed before at
MyReporter.com. Here's a link to a previous post:



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4003
